Summer Workday

Posted by Nicholas Anderson | Jun 10, 2020

Missing out on the Fellowship that Scouting brings? The Lodge is hosting a Workday at Camp Durant to prepare for the Enhanced Troop Campouts this summer. Itll be a great way to give back to Camp Durant, earn service hours, and meet your fellow Arrowmen who you havent seen in a while. Lunch will be provided to all in attendance.
